verses.verse: <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H2416>lived<s%> <S%H3967>one<s%> <S%H6242>hundred<s%> <S%H7651>twenty-seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> This was the <S%H8141>length<s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah<s%>'s <S%H2416>life.<s%>

<S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H7153>Kiriath<s%> <S%H2275>Arba<s%> (the same is Hebron), in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn<s%> for <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> and to weep for <S%H1058>her.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> and a <S%H8453>foreigner<s%> living with <S%H5414>you.<s%> Give me a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>burying-place<s%> with <S%H6912>you,<s%> that I may bury my <S%H4191>dead<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight.<s%>"
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> saying to <S%H559>him,<s%>

"Hear <S%H8085>us,<s%> my <S%H113>lord.<s%> You are a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> among <S%H8432>us.<s%> <S%H6912>Bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead<s%> in the <S%H4005>best<s%> of our <S%H6913>tombs.<s%> <S%H3808>None<s%> of us will <S%H3607>withhold<s%> from you his <S%H6913>tomb.<s%> <S%H6912>Bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself to the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>

He <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "If it <S%H3426>be<s%> your <S%H5315>mind<s%> that I should <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H4191>dead<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H6293>me,<s%> and entreat for me to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6714>Zohar,<s%>

that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> me the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> which he <S%H7097>has,<s%> which is in the end of his <S%H7704>field.<s%> For the <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H3701>price<s%> let him give <S%H5414>it<s%> to me among <S%H8432>you<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>burying-place.<s%>"

Now <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> was <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%> <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> even of all who went <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H113>"No,<s%> my lord, hear <S%H8085>me.<s%> <S%H5414>I<s%> give you the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H5414>I<s%> give you the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in <S%H5414>it.<s%> In the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H6912>you.<s%> Bury your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> bowed himself <S%H7812>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "But if <S%H3863>you<s%> <S%H8085>will,<s%> please hear <S%H5414>me.<s%> I will give the <S%H3701>price<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> it from <S%H6912>me,<s%> and I will bury my dead <S%H4191>there.<s%>"
<S%H6085>Ephron<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> saying to <S%H559>him,<s%>

"My <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H776>me.<s%> What is a piece of land worth <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and <S%H6912>you?<s%> Therefore bury your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron.<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> which he had <S%H1696>named<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> according to the <S%H5674>current<s%> <S%H5503>merchants<s%>' standard.

So the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron,<s%> which was in <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> which was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> the <S%H4631>cave<s%> which was in <S%H6086>it,<s%> and all the trees that were in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that were in all of <S%H5439>its<s%> <S%H1366>borders,<s%> were <S%H6965>deeded<s%>

to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> for a <S%H4736>possession<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> before all who went <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3651>this,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre<s%> (that <S%H2275>is,<s%> Hebron), in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

The <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in <S%H6965>it,<s%> were deeded to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a burying <S%H6913>place<s%> by the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>
